1.title: Buddy Guy

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Ernie Ball highlights blues legend, Buddy Guy. Experience the story behind Buddy's sonic beginnings, the artists, influences and historic Chicago locations that shaped his sound and obsession with all things guitar.

2.title: Mike Ness

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Ernie Ball highlights iconic singer-songwriter and guitarist for Social Distortion, Mike Ness. Experience the story behind Mike's sonic beginnings, the influences and heroes that shaped his sound and obsession with all things guitars, vinyl and Americana.

3.title: Billy Duffy

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Ernie Ball highlights the iconic British rock and roll guitarist for The Cult, Billy Duffy. Experience the story behind Billy's sonic beginnings, influences that shaped his sound and obsession with all things guitar.

4.title: Hunter Hayes

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Ernie Ball highlights GRAMMY nominated singer-songwriter and guitarist, Hunter Hayes. Experience the story behind Hunter's sonic beginnings, the influences that shaped his sound and obsession with all things guitar, vinyl and life on the road as a touring musician.

5.title: Tom DeLonge

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Ernie Ball highlights Blink-182/Angels and Airwaves guitarist and songwriter Tom DeLonge.

6.title: James Valentine

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Ernie Ball highlights Maroon 5 guitars and songwriter James Valentine. Experience the story behind James' sonic evolution from his start Lincoln Nebraska, to the world's largest stadiums with one of rock's most successful bands, Maroon 5.

7.title: Butch Walker

episode of.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Much like a fingerprint, every guitar player's tone is uniquely their own. Formed over the course of a lifetime of practice, performing sweat-filled clubs, bloodied finger tips, guitar, string, amplifier and effects configurations as well as the influences that inspired their very first note, a guitarist's tone is an endless journey of creative discovery, trial, error and relentless knob turning. Since the dawn of recorded music only a handful of players have developed a sound and style so signature that after hearing merely a few notes their names explode into our minds. From Buddy Guy's soulful vibrato, Billy Duffy's arena rock riffs, Hunter Hayes' chicken-pickin' twang and the pioneering punk-sneer of Mike Ness, these purveyors of tone have taken a lifetime of influences and made them their own with the bare essentials of sound - a pack of slinkys and a guitar. Or more simply said; wood and steel. It's these incredible stories that ERNIE BALL, the three-generation family-run company behind the world's most recorded guitar strings and the innovators of SLINKYS will capture and share with the world in a new original series titled Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone
imdb.title: Ernie Ball: The Pursuit of Tone
